description:
Take off for Bubble Island! Only seconds to master, but fun for hours: toss multi-colored bubbles into the sky to pop 3 or more of the same color.

Join Malia and Kale in their quest for treasure on a heavenly island. Explore a colorful tropical island, from the beach to the rainforest, in this surprising puzzle game!
- SO ADDICTIVE! Aim at the bubbles and burst them by touching the screen with your finger or tilting your phone.
- HOURS OF ENDLESS PLAY: enjoy the 100+ evolving levels with 7 types of challenges, deal with 17 different kind of special bubbles to spice up the game, but beware -- foes like angry monkeys, spiders, and parrots will do their best to stop you!
- SEA, BUBBLES AND FUN on a heavenly island: cute, colorful 3D graphics for your gaming pleasure.

The top-rated mobile bubble game now on your device!

- Tested on Pre, Pre2
